Class User

  • java.lang.Object
    • User

  • public class User
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      User(java.lang.String name)
      Creates an instance of the User class with the specified name and a newly initialized instance of Karma.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Post addPost(java.lang.String subreddit, PostType type, java.lang.String title)
      Instantiate a new post with the appropriate parameters and add it to the list of posts posted by the user.
      void dislike(Post post)
      Downvote the post and add it to the List of disliked posts if not already disliked; else undo the dislike.
      java.util.List<Post> getDisliked()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts disliked by the user the list itself should not be exposed.
      Karma getKarma()
      Return the karma of the current user.
      java.util.List<Post> getLiked()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts liked by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Return the name of the current user.
      java.util.List<Post> getPosted()
      Returns a copy of the list of posts posted by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
      java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubscribed()
      Returns a copy of the list of subreddits the user is subscribed to; the list itself should not be exposed.
      void like(Post post)
      Upvote the post and add it to the List of liked posts if not already liked; else undo the like.If the post is currently disliked by the user, the dislike should be undone.
      void subscribe(java.lang.String subreddit)
      Add the specified subreddit to the List of subscribed subreddits if the user is not already subscribed.
      void undoDislike(Post post)
      Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
      void undoLike(Post post)
      Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
      void unsubscribe(java.lang.String subreddit)
      Remove the specified subreddit from the List of subscribed subreddits if present; if not, do nothing.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • User

        public User(java.lang.String name)
        Creates an instance of the User class with the specified name and a newly initialized instance of Karma. The Lists will be initialized to new ArrayLists of the relevant types as applicable.
        Parameters:
        name -

      • getSubscribed

        public java.util.List<java.lang.String> getSubscribed()
        Returns a copy of the list of subreddits the user is subscribed to; the list itself should not be exposed.
        Returns:
        subscribed

      • getPosted

        public java.util.List<Post> getPosted()
        Returns a copy of the list of posts posted by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
        Returns:
        posted

      • getLiked

        public java.util.List<Post> getLiked()
        Returns a copy of the list of posts liked by the user; the list itself should not be exposed.
        Returns:

      • getDisliked

        public java.util.List<Post> getDisliked()
        Returns a copy of the list of posts disliked by the user the list itself should not be exposed.
        Returns:
        disliked

      • subscribe

        public void subscribe(java.lang.String subreddit)
        Add the specified subreddit to the List of subscribed subreddits if the user is not already subscribed. If the user is already subscribed, unsubscribe from the subreddit.
        Parameters:
        subreddit -

      • unsubscribe

        public void unsubscribe(java.lang.String subreddit)
        Remove the specified subreddit from the List of subscribed subreddits if present; if not, do nothing.
        Parameters:
        subreddit -

      • addPost

        Parameters:

        type -

      • like

        public void like(Post post)
        Upvote the post and add it to the List of liked posts if not already liked; else undo the like.If the post is currently disliked by the user, the dislike should be undone.
        Parameters:
        post -

      • undoLike

        public void undoLike(Post post)
        Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
        Parameters:
        post -

      • dislike

        public void dislike(Post post)
        Downvote the post and add it to the List of disliked posts if not already disliked; else undo the dislike. If the post is currently liked by the user, the like should be undone.
        Parameters:
        post -

        public void undoDislike(Post post)
        Remove the post from the list of disliked posts and update its karma appropriately.
        Parameters:
        post -
